p.n: Cleveland Cavaliers: The Miracle at Richfield
p.k: The first play-off series in team history (an Eastern Conference semifinal against the Washington Bullets) was highlighted by three last-second
Ron Harper, 30 points, and the Cleveland Cavaliers held off Patrick Ewing, 21 points, and the New York Knicks by a score of 96-104

n.u: Celtics/Cavaliers, 1992 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals - Game

p.n: Celtics/Cavaliers, 1992 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals - Game 7
p.k: Game 7 in Cleveland belonged to the Cavs, 122-104, with Bird limited to 12 points in 33 minutes. Cleveland reached the conference finals for the first
In LeBron James' first NBA game, he dazzled the crowd with 25 points, 6 rebounds, and 9 assists. However, the Kings pulled out the victory over the Cavaliers
LeBron James put on a masterful performance, scoring 48 points in a Double-OT victory over the Pistons
LeBron James made a fadeaway 3-pointer over Orlando's Hedo Turkoglu as the final horn sounded to give the Cleveland Cavaliers a 96-95 victory
LeBron James delivered on a vow to his home state and brought the Cavs back from the brink as they became the first team to rally from a 3-1 Finals
